    Tech Resources and Tools

    Welcome to the Resources & Tools page on Beauty on Code!

    This section gathers valuable links, tools, and references that complement the tutorials and guides on the blog. Here, you’ll find developer resources, programming tools, and recommended learning materials to help you expand your knowledge and build your skills.

    Programming Languages

    JavaScript, Python, Java, Ruby, Go, C++, etc.

    • Comprehensive Python Cheatsheet

    Frontend Development

    HTML, CSS, JavaScript frameworks (React, Vue, Angular), UI/UX, Web Design, CSS preprocessors, etc.

    Backend Development

    Databases (SQL, NoSQL), Server Management, Authentication, APIs (REST, GraphQL), Backend Frameworks (Express, Django, Spring), etc.

    Full-Stack Development

    Integrations, MERN/MEAN stacks, JAMstack, Microservices, etc.

    • cotton for Django - Bringing component-based design to django templates
    • Full Stack FastAPI Template

      DevOps & Infrastructure

    CI/CD, Containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), Cloud Computing (AWS, Azure, GCP), Infrastructure as Code, Monitoring & Logging, etc.

    Version Control & Collaboration

    Git, GitHub, GitLab, Code Review, Project Management Tools (Jira, Trello)

    Mobile Development

    iOS (Swift), Android (Kotlin), Cross-Platform (React Native, Flutter)

    Data Science & Machine Learning

    Data Analysis, Machine Learning, AI, Deep Learning, Data Visualization, Libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn)

    Security & Privacy

    Encryption, Authentication, Vulnerability Management, Application Security, Compliance (GDPR, HIPAA)

    Testing & Debugging

    Unit Testing, Integration Testing, Performance Testing, Tools (Jest, Mocha, Selenium)

    Productivity & Workflow

    Developer Tools (Visual Studio Code, Terminal, Docker), Automation, Scripting, Task Management

    • Notion
    • Obsidition
    • Google Docs
      • Use Google Docs tab help organize content
      • Use extension “Code Block” to format code

    Environment & Configuration Management

    Environment Variables, Configuration Files, Secret Management (Dotenv, Vault), Container Configurations

    • dotenvx - a better dotenv–from the creator of dotenv
    • uv - an extremely fast Python package and project manager, written in Rust.

    Code Formatting & Linting

    Prettier, Black, Pylint, Ruff, etc.

    • Ruff - an extremely fast Python linter and code formatter, written in Rust.

    APIs & Web Services

    REST APIs, GraphQL, WebSockets, API Management, OAuth, OpenAPI Specification

    Networking

    HTTP/HTTPS, TCP/IP, DNS, Load Balancing, WebSockets, Caching

    Performance Optimization

    Browser Rendering, Code Splitting, Lazy Loading, Caching, Page Load Speed, Performance Testing

    Software Architecture & Design Patterns

    Microservices, Monolithic, Clean Architecture, SOLID Principles, Design Patterns (MVC, Singleton)

    Cloud & Serverless Computing

    AWS Lambda, Azure Functions, Google Cloud Functions, Serverless Framework

    Developer Communities & Open Source

    Contributions, GitHub Projects, Open Source Licensing, Community Forums

    Feel free to contribute your suggestions in this page.
